treatment-md.title: Physalaemus lateristriga Cassini, Cruz & Caramaschi, 2010, new combination
treatment-md.article-title: Taxonomic review of Physalaemus olfersii (Lichtenstein & Martens, 1856) with revalidation of Physalaemus lateristriga (Steindachner, 1864) and description of two new related species (Anura: Leiuperidae)
